alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:37PM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow. Snowfall accumulations of 10 to 18 inches have occurred in the Star Valley; 4 to 6 inches near Jackson, with locally higher amounts of 15 to 18 inches near Wilson and Teton Village; 4 to 8 inches near Pinedale, with locally higher amounts over 12 inches near Bondurant. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with lesser amounts toward Pinedale. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph in the Jackson Valley will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Star Valley, Upper Green River Basin Foothills and Jackson Hole. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility down to a quarter of mile at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
